channel.title: Hidden Populations on Nicholas Fox
channel.description: Recent content in Hidden Populations on Nicholas Fox

item.title: 1: Measuring the Size of Hidden Populations
item.description: Many people live with stigma, or some trait that devalues them in the view of others. For some, this stigma can be concealed - sexual orientation or smoking can both be stigmatizing but can be kept secret from other people. However, there are many times where it is important to know how many people identify with a particular stigma. For example, drug users who use needles are at an increased risk for HIV and other bloodborne pathogens.
